body_html:
It looks like there are a number of independent changes in this patch. Can you please split them up into separate commits? (You can leave it as one PR if you like, or split it up into multiple PRs.)

Splitting up the patch makes our lives as reviewers much easier, since the difficulty of reviewing a patch is roughly quadratic in the size of the patch. It also makes it easier for us to verify that each change is appropriately tested.

Feel free to ask if you need help with the git commands for splitting up the change. There are lots of tutorials on the web, but in general, git add -p, git commit --amend and git rebase -i are your friends.

Feel free to ask if you need help with the git commands for splitting up the change.  There are lots of tutorials on the web, but in general, git add -p, git commit --amend and git rebase -i are your friends.
body:
It looks like there are a number of independent changes in this patch.  Can you please split them up into separate commits?  (You can leave it as one PR if you like, or split it up into multiple PRs.)

Splitting up the patch makes our lives as reviewers much easier, since the difficulty of reviewing a patch is roughly quadratic in the size of the patch.  It also makes it easier for us to verify that each change is appropriately tested.

Feel free to ask if you need help with the git commands for splitting up the change.  There are lots of tutorials on the web, but in general, `git add -p`, `git commit --amend` and `git rebase -i` are your friends.
